briefdescription.para: Specifies whether the link to the OLE object is automatically updated or not in Microsoft Word.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is false.

briefdescription.para: Gets the CLSID of the OLE object.
Gets icon caption of OLE object. In case of OLE object is not embedded as icon or caption couldn't be retrieved returns empty string.
Returns true if the OLE object is linked (when SourceFullName is specified).
Specifies whether the link to the OLE object is locked from updates.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is false.

briefdescription.para: Gets OleControl objects if this OLE object is an ActiveX control. Otherwise this property is null.
Gets the draw aspect of the OLE object. When true, the OLE object is displayed as an icon. When false, the OLE object is displayed as content.

detaileddescription.para: Aspose.Words does not allow to set this property to avoid confusion. If you were able to change the draw aspect in Aspose.Words, Microsoft Word would still display the OLE object in its original draw aspect until you edit or update the OLE object in Microsoft Word.

briefdescription.para: Provide access to OlePackage if OLE object is an OLE Package. Returns null otherwise.
Gets or sets the ProgID of the OLE object.

detaileddescription.para: The ProgID property is not always present in Microsoft Word documents and cannot be relied upon.
Cannot be null.
The default value is an empty string.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets the path and name of the source file for the linked OLE object.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is an empty string.
If SourceFullName is not an empty string, the OLE object is linked.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets a string that is used to identify the portion of the source file that is being linked.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is an empty string.
For example, if the source file is a Microsoft Excel workbook, the SourceItem property might return "Workbook1!R3C1:R4C2" if the OLE object contains only a few cells from the worksheet.

briefdescription.para: Gets the file extension suggested for the current embedded object if you want to save it into a file.
Gets the file name suggested for the current embedded object if you want to save it into a file.
Gets OLE object data entry.
Gets OLE object raw data.
Saves the data of the embedded object into the specified stream.

detaileddescription.para: It is the responsibility of the caller to dispose the stream.

briefdescription.para: Saves the data of the embedded object into a file with the specified name.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::OleFormat::get_AutoUpdate.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::OleFormat::get_IsLocked.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::OleFormat::get_ProgId.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::OleFormat::get_SourceFullName.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::OleFormat::get_SourceItem.
Provides access to the data of an OLE object or ActiveX control.

detaileddescription.para: Use the OleFormat property to access the data of an OLE object. You do not create instances of the OleFormat class directly.
